archimate:Requirement.name: PM.2.1.1: A security, education, training and awareness (SETA) programme should be established to promote and embed expected security behaviour throughout the organisation and establish a security-positive culture.
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
